channel.title: Jagex's Goldmine decompiled
channel.description:
Was bored today, I couldn't get it to load fully, but it goes to 70 percent.
Must run as an applet, doesnt have a void main() for some reason lol.
http://rapidshare.com/files/9308241/SilverMine.rar.html

item.title: Jagex's Goldmine decompiled
item.dc:creator: @Java_Lava Java Lava
item.description:
@Java_Lava wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:3, topic:40421”][quote author=Java Lava link=topic=56663.msg700339#msg700339 date=1167355622]
Was bored today, I couldn’t get it to load fully, but it goes to 70 percent.

Must run as an applet, doesnt have a void main() for some reason lol.

http://rapidshare.com/files/9308241/SilverMine.rar.html
[/quote]

um you sure you did this? you decompiled it all but didnt know how to change the codebase and the name of the class in the index file?

[/quote]

Yes, about the class name. Renamed it from goldmine.class before I packaged it, sorry about that. The codebase might have been the problem, but since jagex used getCodeBase(); all the time, wasn’t sure if I should keep it or remove.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex's Goldmine decompiled
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Java Lava, post:1, topic:40421”]Was bored today, I couldn’t get it to load fully, but it goes to 70 percent.

Must run as an applet, doesnt have a void main() for some reason lol.

http://rapidshare.com/files/9308241/SilverMine.rar.html[/quote]

um you sure you did this? you decompiled it all but didnt know how to change the codebase and the name of the class in the index file?

newayz here is some of the map codes,

Z = invisible wall (allows boulders to pass)
A = incline ramp
E = upside down ramp
O = square wall
0 = square wall
< = square wall with bite out of left side
B = square wall with top piece missing
F = square wall with bottom piece missing

= a blue block no idea what it does

% = another blue block
| = ladder

  • = ladder with brick background
    C = square wall bite out of bottom right side
    G = square wall bite out of top right side
    : = spikes!
  • = another block

= a block with bite out of right side
D = upside down ramp
8 = another brick woohoo
H = incline plain from right to left

  • = falling rock
    = = moving brick
    ! = moving ladder
    ~ = moving water
    ; = rising and lowering spikes
    ^ = bats
    R = rats
    S = start

Read full topic
